ShouldersSLShoulderPress.name: Sled Shoulder Press
ShouldersSLShoulderPress.preparation: Set and grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip.
ShouldersSLShoulderPress.execution: Press handles upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersSLShoulderPress.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide.
ShouldersSLShoulderPress.synergists: supraspinatus, trapeziusmiddle, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, deltoidlateral, trapeziuslower, serratusanterior

ShouldersSLShoulderPressParGrip.name: Sled Shoulder Press (parallel grip)
ShouldersSLShoulderPressParGrip.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp parallel bar grips to front of shoulders on each side.
ShouldersSLShoulderPressParGrip.execution: Press handles upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersSLShoulderPressParGrip.comments: Parallel grip can be used for variety or when flexibility does not permit standard overhand grip further back.
ShouldersSLShoulderPressParGrip.synergists: trapeziusmiddle, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, deltoidlateral, trapeziuslower, serratusanterior
